solution_line_template: Victor needs {num_fried_orders} * {pieces_per_fried} = <<{num_fried_orders}*{pieces_per_fried}={fried_total}>>{fried_total} pieces of chicken for Fried Chicken Dinners.
He needs {num_pasta_orders} * {pieces_per_pasta} = <<{num_pasta_orders}*{pieces_per_pasta}={pasta_total}>>{pasta_total} pieces of chicken for Chicken Pasta.
He needs {num_bbq_orders} * {pieces_per_bbq} = <<{num_bbq_orders}*{pieces_per_bbq}={bbq_total}>>{bbq_total} pieces of chicken for Barbecue Chicken orders.
Thus, he needs {fried_total} + {pasta_total} + {bbq_total} = <<{fried_total}+{pasta_total}+{bbq_total}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pieces of chicken.
